Tired of those damn LONG PLAYING ad intros in your games?
You know, the Nvidia logo and Take Two game logo and so on, you have to wait for them 
to finish just to get to the game.
Some games wont let you go past it by tapping the escape key.

So this is where I come in.
This is for the Damnation Game. Gets rid of the annoying logo ads when the game starts.

Cut all the LOGO's 

Copy these files into the DamnationDamnGameMovies folder.
(in case this doesnt show the backslashes, find the "Damnation" folder then the "DamnGame" folder and then the "Movies" unzip this in there)
When asked to overwrite the existing files. Say Yes.
You may backup your old files if you wish, but why, who wants credits?

Start the game and wala! go right to the game!!! 

This file is zipped up, so download and just unzip it in that folder!

Be watching for more for other games as over the next few days I will be releasing a 
bunch more of these.
